P

paintComponent(Graphics) - Method in class charts.ChartPanel
All the custom painting code to draw the background, the coordinate axis and labels, the charts, the crosshair, the indicators and the alarm lines is called from this method.
preferences - package preferences
 
PreferencesController - Class in preferences
An instance of this class acts as a controller between a application preferences model and view.
PreferencesController(ApplicationPreferencesModel, PreferencesDialog, IPreferencesPersistence) - Constructor for class preferences.PreferencesController
Constructs new preferences controller.
PreferencesDialog - Class in preferences
An instance of class functions as the view for the application preferences.
PreferencesDialog(MainFrame, DataProviderPreferencesPanel) - Constructor for class preferences.PreferencesDialog
Constructs the preferences dialog.
PreferencesPersistenceWithJSON - Class in preferences
An instance of this class handles storing application preferences in a persistent configuration file on disk.
PreferencesPersistenceWithJSON() - Constructor for class preferences.PreferencesPersistenceWithJSON
This constructor create a default configuration file if no config file exists.
price - Variable in class charts.Alarm
The user defined threshold price.
PriceChangeDirection - Enum in watchlist
The constants in this enumeration serve to define whether a stock is falling, rising or staying constant in price.
PriceColorRenderer - Class in watchlist
An instance of this renderer handles the coloration of the price cells in the watchlist table in response to changing stock prices.
PriceColorRenderer() - Constructor for class watchlist.PriceColorRenderer
 
processWebSocketTradeMessage(String) - Method in class main.MainController
Process trade messages received from the data provider through the web socket connection.
processWebSocketTradeMessage(String) - Method in interface webSocket.IWebSocketListener
Process trade messages received from the data provider through the web socket connection.
